Name: opal_waxbill_3803
Text: Honestly, I find the endless fan theories about Geralt’s past and the Witcher timeline more confusing than illuminating—sometimes I think the lore gets lost in its own complexity.

Comments.Name: scrupulous_wildebees
Comments.Text: Sometimes the beauty of the lore is in its mystery—overanalyzing can spoil the magic.

Comments.Name: tacky_lemur_9208
Comments.Text: I agree that the complexity can be overwhelming, but I also think it’s part of what makes the world so rich and intriguing.

Comments.Name: curly_leech_3078
Comments.Text: Honestly, the convoluted lore just muddles the story, making it harder to appreciate the characters rather than enriching the world.
